title: CPUID HWMonitor Pro v1.15 with Key [iahq76]
description:
HWMonitor Pro

What is HWMonitor

HWMonitor is a hardware monitoring program that reads PC systems main health sensors : voltages, temperatures, fans speed.
The program handles the most common sensor chips, like ITEÃ‚Â® IT87 series, most WinbondÃ‚Â® ICs, and others. In addition, it can read modern CPUs on-die core thermal sensors, as well has hard drives temperature via S.M.A.R.T, and video card GPU temperature.
